projects.Title: A Landing Page Using HTML, SCSS, JS AND JQuery
projects.description: A web project built with HTML, SCSS, Bootstrap, JS, and jQuery. The objective of this project is to create a landing page that is visually appealing, responsive, and user-friendly. The landing page provides information about the Booster Professional Series Massager, a massage gun trusted by athletes worldwide. Key Highlights including HTML markup, CSS styling with SCSS and Bootstrap, JavaScript programming, and jQuery functionality. Additionally, the project demonstrates an understanding of responsive design principles, accessibility considerations, and best practices for web development.
projects.author: https://fueler.io/prantikseal

projects.Title: A Valentine Card Generator[ReactJS]
projects.description: Problem Statement: With Valentine's Day being celebrated today, there is a need for a quick and easy way for people to express their love and affection to their significant others, family, and friends. However, not everyone has the time or creativity to make a personalized Valentine's Day card. To solve this problem, the Valentine's Day e-card generator project aims to provide a solution by allowing users to create personalized e-cards that can be shared digitally with their loved ones. Code Repo Link: here Tech Stack: Front-end:

projects.Title: 500+ Fueler Wallpaper Collection [NextJS]
projects.description: Discover new and freshly looking mobile and laptop wallpapers. Time to give a makeover to your system. We at fueler.io have built a wallpaper showcasing website using the Next.js framework. This website has two routing options: one for mobile wallpapers and one for desktop wallpapers. Each wallpaper has copy and downloading functionalities.
